overview:
Since 2004, Miss White has played an active role in the digital marketing community. She is recognized as a highly accomplished senior sales manager with verifiable year-after-year success achieving revenue and business growth objectives within start-up, turnaround and rapid change environments.

Chantelle’s introduction to the digital marketing space was in early 2004 with Epic Media Group (formally AzoogleAds). Initially based in the Canadian office, Miss White was one of two employees who relocated to the company’s Manhattan headquarters. It was here Chantelle successfully delivered on the initiative of building the US-based Publisher Marketing division. Her responsibilities included overseeing key functions of the publisher sales division, serving as a corporate ambassador for external marketing initiatives and new business development, providing key strategic input on corporate marketing and publisher sales team initiatives. Prior to her relocation, Miss. White championed the growth of an intercontinental publisher portfolio, integrated a variety of marketing solutions and surpassed targeted metrics for existing key accounts.

With proven accomplishments in establishing and cultivating relationships with C-level executives to secure contracts, seize control of critical problem areas and deliver on client commitments, Chantelle joined the MediaTrust team in 2008. As Director of Sales, she was responsible for strategic partnership alliances, new business development and tactical portfolio management.

Today, Chantelle is laser focused within the mobile advertising and publishing market. Her work with Blu Trumpet, a mobile marketing platform incubated out of Hatch Labs/IAC, consists of forging new partnerships with premium mobile publishers to create multi-screen app discovery with tailored monetization and consumer acquisition solutions.

milestones.description: Business Development and Partnerships at MediaTrust
